price: 97. Y di: «¡Señor!, busco refugio en Ti de los susurros de los demonios.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
